summary: Motivated Systems Analyst with extensive SDLC and Computer Systems Validation (CSV) experience across diverse environments. Expertise in document management, client/server applications, data communications, and IT support. Proven project leadership, analytical mindset, problem-solving abilities, and strong communication skills.

experience.title: Consultant
experience.description: Provided SDLC/CSV-focused consultancy supporting McNeil Consumer Healthcare across applications including shop floor, document management, timekeeper, and business process solutions. Roles encompassed Level 2 production support, issue analysis and root cause analysis, change request facilitation, and coordination with Windows, DBA, and other support teams. Monitored validation and training environments, generated scheduled/adhoc reports, performed consistency checks, and assisted with application enhancements and upgrades. Supported SOX-compliant payroll and multiple Microsoft Access-based databases with VBA code development.

experience.title: Consultant
experience.description: Provided design, development, testing and support for client/server messaging between VAX and IBM systems for a large steel company. Contributed to an electronic batch record application within a large team, and provided relational database expertise across multiple projects. Delivered training for several Digital products and offered system administration support.

experience.title: Systems Programmer
experience.description: Designed, developed, tested and supported a real-time client/server messaging application to enable communications from a VAX/VMS system to an IBM system. The application tracked train movements and locations, originally written in assembly language and later ported to C. Performed general system and network administration.

education.degree: M.S in Computer Science Data Communications
